summary: Request to adopt buf for Protocol Buffer linting against Google's style guide and clang-format for autoformatting proto files to improve code quality and consistency.
userImpact: Better proto file consistency and adherence to protobuf standards makes generated SDKs more reliable and maintainable across all language implementations.
proposedFix: Use buf for linting against protobuf style guide and clang-format for autoformatting proto files
resolutionDetails: Team made necessary changes to comply with protobuf style guide (adding UNSPECIFIED to enums, converting to SCREAMING_CASE, snake_case fields) and buf linting now passes with 0 violations
